reviews.text: this hotel is an absolute dump, we hired an apartment which wa 150 sterling for 1 night with no breakfast, was supposed to have 2 rooms it had one with a pull out sofa in the living area, the bed sheets were filthy dirty, the shower didnt work and there were no glasses inthe hotel, check in was ridiculously slow and i didnt find staff at all helpful, would never stay here again
reviews.title: never again

reviews.text: Price was good £65 b&b for 2 ppl for 1 night. Location was good it was very central, the rooms were basic enough but again good for the money, the breakfast was very good :) I think this place is ideal for stag n hen parties. When we went to breakfast we noticed that most ppl at breakfast wer stag n hens on the back if this we were not disrupted during the night by noise which was excellent :)
reviews.title: Good location, good price.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff were polite and helpful. The cost was quite reasonable. It's very convenient to the bus centre and in the middle of the town centre.
reviews.title: Practical and Comfortable

reviews.text: stayed there last weekend for 2night on stag party and had no problems with the hotel at all. staff were friendly and helpful and dinner was lovely. it is beside all bars n clubs. ideal and value for money
reviews.title: Great Place for stag party

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Reception staff very friendly. And that was it - despite the sign hanging over the street with special offers for dinner there was no food available. The hotel is old and desperately needs refurbishment - no car park available other than a paid multi-storey nearby
reviews.title: Give it a miss

reviews.text: Stayed in this hotel for a nite. Have to say not bad. Staff are friendly and quick to get you checked in. Not to far from the bars. Do not stay here if you are looking to get a good nites sleep as it is mainly hen and stag groups that stay here. would recommend this hotel as it was clean and very well priced. we ate in the bar was nice. Didnt have breakfast went to the bagel cafe down he street instead. I will definately book again.
reviews.title: Prime location

reviews.text: We stayed here on a hen do, and it was a lovely place to stay- the people are friendly and very nice. It is right in the middle of the town so it is in a perfect location, the rooms are clean and well spaced out, the bathroom was imaculate, would definately return to the letterkenny court, didnt sample the breakfast but some of the other girls said it was very good. The bar stays open to late. Our room was facing the main street and their was no problem getting to sleep, some of our party stayed in the apartments and they were very spacious and well kept.
reviews.title: Excellent place to stay

reviews.text: This is a great hotel, clean and reasonable, the staff were lovely to deal with and very accomodating. Would definately recommend and have booked again for this year!
reviews.title: Christmas party night with overnight stay

reviews.text: stayed in this hotel on sat17th sep.I have to say it is a complete dump> therre was a group of us there for a civilised one nite stag party. On arrival there is a 50 euro deposit in case any damage is done to the room, even though a credit card was used to pay for the room!! Anyway on depature the next morning i asked for my 50 euro to be returned,whereupon the receptionist made a call to get someone to check our room.. Everything was in order, but then she informed me that until all the 12 people had checked out of the rooms, and they were checked, iwould then be refunded. never heard such a load of bull in my life!! Wouldnt mind but it would be nearly impossible to wreck anything, as the place is a stinking kip!!AVOID AT ALL COSTS!!
reviews.title: worst hotel i ever stayed in!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Booked our two night stay through the local Tourist Office. I wish they had warned us about Hen and Stag parties. Our room was fine but the reception area is in dire need of a make-over. Very shabby. Friday night was fine, but we were kept awake from 3.30 am onwards on Saturday. The noise in the corridor was terrible- screaming, swearing, banging of doors.
reviews.title: Avoid at weekends

reviews.text: I stayed in this hotel last weekend with a group of friends.
reviews.title: Okay for a lads night out but wouldn't bring my wife there.

reviews.text: The staff in reception were very polite and helpful.
reviews.title: Good quality for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was clean and although it was very cold at first, it did heat up after a little while.
reviews.title: Great Hotel - Perfect for touring the area

reviews.text: The shower was very powerful but the floor got very wet from using the shower as the curtain could not contain it.
reviews.title: excellent weekend

reviews.text: There was a little damage to the room door as if somone had kicked it open at some stage, but it still locked properly.
reviews.title: we will be back !!

reviews.text: Hubby's family live about 40mins from Letterkenny. We often go out to the pubs/clubs and either one of us has to be a designated driver or pay highly for a return taxi if we head out.
reviews.title: Cheaper than a taxi home! Looks good for hen/stag

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I looked into the Letterkenny Court Hotel on behalf of a friend, and was plesently shocked at the cheap rates for a Saturday night, 45euro for a double room! Promptly booked it and enjoyed a quiet and content nights sleep (albeit a little hungover). Was in walking distance to the bars we went to. Was clean and functional.
reviews.title: Good food

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Would not recommend for a relaxing break, but its right in the centre of town and very accessible. There is an adjoining car park for 5euro per night. There seemed to be a hen party there too, but we didn't hear them at all. Didn't make breakfast (and didn't plan to)
reviews.title: mid week break

reviews.text: Was basic and clean and would stay again.
reviews.title: Our 4th visit to Letterkenny Court Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Didn't stay at this hotel but had evening meal. Panini with chicken and a bowl of soup which was very nice. Husband had the curry which he enjoyed. Nice bar with friendly staff. Music at weekends. Would recommend for a quick bite and nice staff.
reviews.title: Very noisy outside, not bad inside!
